wiki.content: According to the Sober Songfacts, Pink explained that this song is, "about the vices that we choose," adding, "I had this idea in my head, 'like how do I feel this good sober?' Pink was nominated for the 2010 Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance for "Sober". User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to the Sober Songfacts, Pink explained that this song is, "about the vices that we choose," adding, "I had this idea in my head, 'like how do I feel this good sober?' Pink was nominated for the 2010 Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance for "Sober".
